title: Best of The Herd for Aug 20, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Aug 20, 2020
description:
The Clippers will be fine. Even dynasties lose playoff games

Colin is happy that Tua isn't starting

The gap between NBA stars and their sidekicks is enormous

The Big Ten needs to be less rigid about its members playing on their own this season

The Raiders issue is not Derek Carr


Guest: Ryen Russillo, The Ringer

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
